verses.roman:
hindura īśvara baḍa yei nārāyaṇa
sei tumi hao,--hena laya mora mana

synonyms: hindura—of the Hindus; īśvara—God; baḍa—the topmost; yei—who; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; sei—He; tumi—You; hao—are; hena—such; laya—takes; mora—my; mana—mind.
translation: "I know that Nārāyaṇa is the Supreme God of the Hindus, and I think that You are the same Nārāyaṇa. This I feel within my mind."
